Text: Cher Discography V.2 will be available in the future I have to acquire the two Sonny and Cher live lps as well as good times ost as those are the only 3 missing lps. Every studio album from cher and sonny are included.
Oh I Forgot to mention all songs from each label are not categorized into ALBUM folders, but just drag it all to iTunes and it will do it all for you. :) Album artwork should kick in like that
